context: An alert was triggered on 2024-07-09 indicating that email messages containing a malicious URL were delivered and later removed. The sender of these emails was santiago@vnevado.alpineskihouse.co, with the sender IP address being 119.36.50.193. The malicious URL in the emails was https://ym018491661.wittytree-b6f239d6.northeurope.azurecontainerapps.io/. Following this, on 2024-07-10, we detected that one of our users clicked on this malicious URL, resulting in a second alert.
question: Can you identify the recipient of the email message that contained the malicious URL?
solution_steps: The email account `bjenkins@niseko.alpineskihouse.co` received an email with a malicious URL, which was later removed.
A potentially malicious URL `http://ym018491661.wittytree-b6f239d6.northeurope.azurecontainerapps.io/` was clicked by one of the users.
